CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Address_Line_1__c ) ,'' ,Address_Line_1__c ) + ' '+ IF( ISBLANK( Address_Line_2__c ) ,'' ,Address_Line_2__c )+' '+ IF( ISBLANK( City__c ) ,'' ,City__c ) +' '+ IF( ISBLANK( State__c ) ,'' ,State__c ) +' ' + IF( ISBLANK( ZipCode__c ) ,'' ,ZipCode__c )
CustomField.label: Expert Address
